name: AirConControl
0:
”"Alexa, turn on name"”
”"Alexa, turn off name"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Skill will control your Pak Ujala device to control your air conditioner. It will only work if you have an original Pak Ujala Aircon Control device and a registered account in the AirCon MS App.


Use Alexa to control your Pak Ujala devices. Control your air conditioner and turn on/off from wherever you are in the world. 


Instructions for setting up the device and account:

1. Download the app (AirCon MS), or go to https://m.pakujala.com.
2. Sign in, or create a new account
3. Add new Pak Ujala Device(s) 
4. Log in to Alexa account and activate AirCon Control Skill
5. Sign in with credentials registered with the app
6. Your device(s) will now be added into Smarthome section of the Alexa app.

Schedule, Group multiple devices and integrate IFTTT for complex functions!
